===Glyph origin===
{{liushu|ic}}: {{lang|zh|森}} is composed of {{zh-l|*木|wood, tree}} repeated three times to suggest a large number (compare {{zh-l|*三}}) of [[trees]] such as one would find in a [[forest]]. Compare {{och-l|林}}.
